name: Hudson Technologies, Inc.
description: Hudson Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative solutions to the refrigeration and air conditioning (HVACR) industry. Founded in 1991 and headquartered in Pearl River, New York, Hudson Technologies specializes in the recovery and reclamation of refrigerants, as well as the sale of refrigerant products and services. With a commitment to environmental sustainability, Hudson plays a crucial role in helping businesses comply with increasingly stringent regulations regarding refrigerant management and emissions. The company operates a state-of-the-art refrigerant reclamation facility, which enables it to process and recycle refrigerants, thereby reducing waste and promoting a circular economy. Hudson Technologies also offers a comprehensive suite of services, including refrigerant management programs, leak detection, and system retrofitting to more environmentally friendly alternatives. Hudson's expertise and dedication to quality have positioned it as a trusted partner for HVACR contractors and end-users alike. With the ongoing global focus on climate change and environmental protection, Hudson Technologies is well-positioned to continue its growth trajectory by providing essential services that benefit both its customers and the planet.
